name: Murchison Falls: A Wildlife Adventure
summary: Immerse yourself in the breathtaking and multi-award-winning 360 VR experience “Murchison Falls”, a 25-minute wildlife adventure that transports you to the heart of Uganda's iconic national park.   Murchison Falls showcases the incredible biodiversity of the park itself, including warthogs bathing, giraffes gracefully wandering the savanna, curious hyenas and young lions playfully practicing their hunting skills. Placing you right in the center of the action with no other humans present.
